name: The Seed of Joy
description:
SCREENSHOTS SYNOPSIS

All the trees in the world are gone, people are devastated, it's up to you to change that.

Submission for the 10th Game Boy Jam

DESCRIPTION

Carefully navigate your way to the top of a building to plant a tree where everyone can see it. Bring hope and joy to everyone again.

Sneak through rooms using the pillars to evade worker's gaze.

Hide from workers using a clever hiding solution.

CONTROLS
  • Up and Down = Up and Down Arrow Keys = Hover over buttons
  • Select = Shift = Pause
  • Start = Enter = Select buttons
  • B = X = Advance Dialogue
  • Left and Right = Left and Right Arrow Keys = Roll Left and Right
  • A = Z = Hide
